data.title: Project Picnic Tables
data.meta_description: Project Picnic Tables The Foundation is assisting with the school’s most recent campus improvement initiative to place picnic tables across campus, including within building courtyards and in front...
data.text:
The Foundation is assisting with the school’s most recent campus improvement initiative to place picnic tables across campus, including within building courtyards and in front of the cafeteria and gym. “The students need places to sit, hang out, do homework,” Principal Yap expressed at a Foundation meeting in April. “Whether it’s during school, or after school when they’re waiting for practice. We want to get more tables and benches on our campus.”

A handful of blue, heavy-duty, steel with a thermo-plastic finish picnic tables have already been placed on campus. With support from the Maui High community, the Maui High School Foundation would like to help the school bring in more to accommodate Maui High’s vast campus and large student body.

Community-funded tables will be labeled with donor recognition plates to perpetually recognize contributions of $300 or more that are made toward this collaborative project. The Foundation encourages Maui High alumni classes to consider sponsoring a table as a class gift. Total cost per table, including shipping, handling, and tax is $1400.

To further establish this project as a shared effort, the school has committed to match the number of tables the Foundation is able to sponsor.

Interested in supporting this project? Make a donation online using the DONATE button to the right, or send your gift by mail to:

MAUI HIGH SCHOOL FOUNDATION

Attn: Project Picnic Tables

660 S. Lono Ave

Kahului, HI 96732

For more information, contact Stacy Wodoson at [email protected] or call 727-4051.

Make a contribution toward more picnic tables on campus! Click on the DONATE button above to donate via credit card. Mahalo for kindly supporting our dear island school!
